{{also|dank|-dank}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|danc}}, from {{inh|de|goh|danc}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*þankaz}}. Compare {{cog|nl|dank}}, {{cog|en|thank}}, {{cog|da|tak}}. More at {{m|en|thank}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/daŋk/}} * {{audio|de|De-Dank.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhymes|de|aŋk}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Dankes|gen2=Danks|-}} # [[thanks]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|n=sg}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Dank sagen}}, {{l|de|danksagen}} * {{l|de|Danksagung}} * {{l|de|Dankschreiben}} * {{l|de|Dankesbezeigung}} * {{l|de|Dankesworte}} * {{l|de|besten Dank}}, {{l|de|herzlichen Dank}}, {{l|de|innigsten Dank}}, {{l|de|lieben Dank}}, {{l|de|schönen Dank}}, {{l|de|tausend Dank}}, {{l|de|verbindlichsten Dank}}, {{l|de|vielen Dank}}, {{l|de|vielen lieben Dank}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|danken}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/taŋk/}} ===Etymology 1=== ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m}} # [[thanks]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|hrx|Gott sei Dank}} ===Etymology 2=== From {{bor|hrx|pt|tanque}}. ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m|plural|Danke}} # a [[sink]] used for [[laundry]] #: {{ux|hrx|Ich wesche ‘s Zeich im '''Danke'''.|}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Pennsylvania German== ===Etymology=== Compare {{cog|de|Dank}}, {{cog|nl|dank}}, {{cog|en|thanks}}. ===Noun=== {{head|pdc|noun|g=m}} # [[thanks]], [[gratitude]] # [[reward]] ---- ==Plautdietsch== ===Noun=== {{head|pdt|noun|g=m|plural|Danke}} # [[thank]]s ====Derived terms==== * {{l|pdt|dankboa}} * {{l|pdt|Dankfast}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|pdt|danke}} [[Category:Plautdietsch one-syllable nouns]]
